A loli + shota hentai that I thought worked well and really like: 149811. On a side note I don't dislike this hentai, just think it'd be better if the male mc was at least 18

@A CULTURED WEEB when I say "Loli hentai is better when the male mc isn't a shota" i mean in general. There are some loli + shota hentai that are great but generally speaking i find the combination of loli and shota in the same hentai... idk... over the top? Too much? Something like that. For the best qualities of the loli or shota to shine the brightest they must be contrasted against an opposite, e.g. loli + man, shota + milf, cute fem shota + man. Most loli + shota hentai are cute but lack punch, reading them is like watching 2 puppies fighting, cute but not particularly interesting and not gonna make me hard. All this is personal opinion of course and occasionally I do find exceptions to what I've said.

Honestly I kinda love the couple wideshot backgrounds and idk why! They're so simple but that's what makes them so charming, they seem very remeniscent of an era in manga where these sorts of character designs were very relevant as well. Kinda nostalgic, and I don't even think I was alive in that era xD
